about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of Tap 4 Sex, a world filled with hot and sexy chicks, a world where your CLICKS matter!

NEW awesome clicker - “TAP 4 Sex!”

“TAP 4 Sex!” is a steamy, animated game that invites you to collect a gallery of breathtakingly gorgeous models! With its stunning graphics and ultra-addictive gameplay, you won’t be able to stop tapping!

“TAP 4 Sex!” is a clicker game that features an array of stunning girls in various seductive poses. Throughout the game, countless tantalizing images will appear, and it's your job to click on them all! Tap 4 Sex is heating up to be one of the best animated games out there. Ready to know more about this irresistible game?

What you can expect from the game:

  • Drop-dead gorgeous pictures and animations of sizzling hot girls.

  • Every click gets a reaction from the girls—making it even more electrifying.

  • Jaw-dropping sound and visual effects that enhance the experience.

  • A gallery packed with alluring images and animations.

  • Outstanding visual design, smoking hot girls, and incredibly easy to play! What else could you want for a perfect gaming experience?

If you’re all about hot, animated models, “TAP 4 Sex!” is the game you’ve been waiting for! Don’t wait any longer—start your adventure, unlock new scenes, and indulge in this irresistible game now!

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity and Sexual Content, General Mature Content

name: Tap 4 Sex

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Quad Core Processor (i3 or equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Quad Core Processor (i3 or equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
